applicant-name.name: ZHONGTAI SUZHOU HYDROGEN ENERGY TECH CO LTD
ZHONGTAI ENERGY TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
中太（苏州）氢能源科技有限公司,
中太能源科技（上海）有限公司

invention-title: Mounting structure for marine equipment, mounting method thereof and storage container
用于船用设备的安装结构及其安装方法和储存容器

abstract.p: The invention relates to an installation structure for marine equipment, an installation method thereof and a storage container, and relates to the technical field of marine equipment, the installation structure is arranged on a secondary insulation module corresponding to a secondary shielding layer, the secondary insulation module is provided with a first wall surface and a second wall surface, the installation structure comprises a sleeve arranged in the secondary insulation module in a penetrating mode, and the first wall surface is provided with a second wall surface; the connecting rod is inserted and matched in the sleeve; one end of the sleeve or the connecting rod exposed out of the first wall surface is provided with a protruding bearing member for installing a main shielding layer. The sleeve is arranged in the secondary insulation module to be matched with the connecting rod, so that the lateral force resistance of the structure is enhanced, the risk that the structure is collapsed is reduced, and the problems of deformation and breakage caused by local structure stress concentration are solved; and meanwhile, when the secondary insulation module is subjected to cold contraction in a low-temperature environment, the connecting rod can axially move relative to the sleeve, so that the cold contraction deformation of the secondary insulation module is compensated.

本发明涉及一种用于船用设备的安装结构及其安装方法和储存容器，涉及船用设备技术领域，安装结构设置于次屏蔽层对应的次绝缘模块上，所述次绝缘模块具有第一壁面及第二壁面，所述安装结构包括穿设于所述次绝缘模块内的套筒，以及插套配合于所述套筒内的连杆；所述套筒或所述连杆外露于第一壁面的一端具有凸出的承载构件，供主屏蔽层安装。本发明通过在次绝缘模块中设置套筒与连杆的配合，增强了结构抵抗侧向力的能力，降低结构被压塌的风险，避免局部结构应力集中而发生变形、断裂的问题；同时在低温环境下次绝缘模块发生冷缩时，连杆能够发生相对于套筒的轴向运动，对次绝缘模块发生的冷缩变形量进行补偿。
